alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT HOUSTON AND SOUTHWESTERN EARLY COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 359 PM EDT/259 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cowarts, or near Cottonwood, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Taylor, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Rehobeth, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Jakin, Memphis, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Garretts Crossroads, Enon, Wilson Mill, and Southern Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
